parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the system deployment instance. This value is returned by CreateSystemInstance. The ID should be in the following format. urn:tdm:REGION/ACCOUNT ID/default:deployment:DEPLOYMENTNAME.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: An object that describes the system instance.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the system instance.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the system instance.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the system instance.

nested_items.name: target
nested_items.description: The target of the system instance.

nested_items.name: greengrassGroupName
nested_items.description: The ID of the Greengrass group where the system instance is deployed.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date when the system instance was created.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the system instance was last updated.

nested_items.name: greengrassGroupId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Greengrass group where the system instance is deployed.

nested_items.name: greengrassGroupVersionId
nested_items.description: The version of the Greengrass group where the system instance is deployed.

nested_items.name: definition
nested_items.description: A document that defines an entity.

nested_items.name: language
nested_items.description: The language used to define the entity. GRAPHQL is the only valid value.

nested_items.name: text
nested_items.description: The GraphQL text that defines the entity.

nested_items.name: s3BucketName
nested_items.description: The Amazon Simple Storage Service bucket where information about a system instance is stored.

nested_items.name: metricsConfiguration
nested_items.description: An object that specifies whether cloud metrics are collected in a deployment and, if so, what role is used to collect metrics.

nested_items.name: cloudMetricEnabled
nested_items.description: A Boolean that specifies whether cloud metrics are collected.

nested_items.name: metricRuleRoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the role that is used to collect cloud metrics.

nested_items.name: validatedNamespaceVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the user's namespace against which the system instance was validated.

nested_items.name: validatedDependencyRevisions
nested_items.description: A list of objects that contain all of the IDs and revision numbers of workflows and systems that are used in a system instance.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the workflow or system.

nested_items.name: revisionNumber
nested_items.description: The revision number of the workflow or system.

nested_items.name: flowActionsRoleArn
nested_items.description: The AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that AWS IoT Things Graph assumes during flow execution in a cloud deployment. This role must have read and write permissionss to AWS Lambda and AWS IoT and to any other AWS services that the flow uses.
